## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Removal of human reads from SARS-CoV-2 sequencing data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/sequence-analysis/tutorials/human-reads-removal/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
